name: Artificial Grass in Buckingham Style 30mm Pile
description: Buckingham has a 30mm Pile natural look grass combining 2 natural grass shades combined with darker green strands helping create an artificial lawn with a natural healthy look. The Buckingham pile is exceptionally thick and is soft to the touch and a joy to walk on, you would struggle to have a natural lawn which looks this good. This product is suitable for gardens, balconies, pool surrounds, play areas and indoor spaces.
